title: WTB: Cobb Green, Young Port, Lajoie Bat, Johnson Port 1.5-2.5
author: dabroiler

posts.post_title: WTB: Cobb Green, Young Port, Lajoie Bat, Johnson Port 1.5-2.5
posts.post_content:
Looking to add some T206 low grades to my collection.

Comment or PM me, please.

Updated list:

Looking for 1.5-2.5 PSA
Cobb (Green)
Cy Young (Portrait)
Matty (dark cap)
Lajoie (w/Bat)
3-Finger Brown (Chicago)
Rube Waddell (throwing)

bump.

I’ve had a lot of very fair offers from great sellers, but they did not fit exactly what I was looking for.

Please keep me in mind if you are looking to sell.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Update: Johnson PURCHASED
